channel.title: Ok plz im in need
channel.description:
ok teheres 4 things i really need there all commands.....
ok i need a working starter command where ocne somone types it they can type it again....
ok next i need working ban command so i ban with out going to ban logs....
ok i need a working ip ban command so i dont hvae to go to logs.....
and last i need an command so ican make ppl mod/admin without goign in to there file and putting the rights....plz assist me on these things...

here is my starter command use it =0

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {
	if (starter == 0) {
	    addItem(995, 50000000);
	    sendMessage("The starter packet for ServerNameHere players !");
	    starter = 1;
	} else if (starter == 1) {
	    sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !");

item.title: Ok plz im in need
item.dc:creator: @D_R_U_G D R U G
item.description:
@D_R_U_G wrote:

add those commands under
}

Starter command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(0995, 10000000); sendMessage("d r u g MADE THIS"); }

Ban command

[code] if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“D r u g”))) {
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim;
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
